# [Interview #1181: Little City Books-AU Tour, Entry #10](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1181#10)

#### Ted Herman

Has Dalinar been on the bondsmith path for a long time? How about Gavilar?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes to both.
